title: 9 Expensive-Looking Amazon Sweaters Perfect For Fall
description: Every year at this time, we find ourselves craving new sweaters - you just can't beat that thrill of finding a new knit or sweatsuit sets to cozy up in all season long. And while we're firm believers that you can never have too many sweaters in your clothing stock (especially if you live somewhere cold), dishing out the money to spend on a variety of styles is often a burden on our wallets. Fortunately, there are plenty of stylish sweaters out there that are equal parts cozy and affordable, and we've recently discovered a few of our favorites from Amazon. It's no secret that the retailer is a hub for deals across pretty much every major category. But when it comes to fashion, the retailer delivers in more ways than one with a massive selection of knits and other top-rated clothing, all at unbelievably low prices - we're talking so affordable, you won't have to spend a penny over $21. Whether you want an elevated yet comfortable sweatshirt or a fitted turtleneck for layering, we've got choices that'll impress you. Take a look at our favorite Amazon sweater options for $21 and under, and score a few before they sell out. With deals like this, we have no doubt they'll be gone in the blink of an eye. Related: Everything to Know About Amazon's October Prime Day 2024
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: We rounded up the best Amazon sweaters for $25 and under.

html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Every year at this time, we find ourselves craving new sweaters — you just can't beat that thrill of finding a new knit or sweatsuit sets to cozy up in all season long. And while we're firm believers that you can never have too many sweaters in your clothing stock (especially if you live somewhere cold), dishing out the money to spend on a variety of styles is often a burden on our wallets.

Fortunately, there are plenty of stylish sweaters out there that are equal parts cozy and affordable, and we've recently discovered a few of our favorites from Amazon. It's no secret that the retailer is a hub for deals across pretty much every major category. But when it comes to fashion, the retailer delivers in more ways than one with a massive selection of knits and other top-rated clothing, all at unbelievably low prices — we're talking so affordable, you won't have to spend a penny over $21.

Whether you want an elevated yet comfortable sweatshirt or a fitted turtleneck for layering, we've got choices that'll impress you. Take a look at our favorite Amazon sweater options for $21 and under, and score a few before they sell out. With deals like this, we have no doubt they'll be gone in the blink of an eye.

Best Oversize Crewneck

ZAFUL Women Winter Sweater Crewneck ($34)

This slightly oversize crewneck sweater is loungewear goals. It has drop-shoulder sleeves and ribbed cuffs and boasts a soft, waffle-knit texture. The heart on the upper left side of the sweater is such a cute touch.

Best Striped Cardigan

LILLUSORY Women's Crew Neck Gold-Button Cardigan ($40, originally $60)

This knitted black-and-white striped cardigan is sophisticated and chic, with gold buttons that level up the look and two pockets for tiny essentials. It comes in several more colors as well, plus some solid monochrome hues.

Best Oversize Cable-Knit Sweater

Pretty Garden Oversized Cable-Knit Sweater ($40)

There's so much to love about this sweater, namely its thick fabric and cable-knit design. "I love the style of this sweater, and the weight is definitely more suited to colder winter temps," writes an Amazon shopper who rated it five stars.

Kyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

- Additional reporting by Natasha Marsh

Natasha Marsh is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
